# interactions

**Instance Property**

The array of interactions for the view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var interactions: [any UIInteraction] { get set }
```

## Adding and removing interactions

- **addInteraction(_:)**: Adds an interaction to the view.
- **removeInteraction(_:)**: Removes an interaction from the view.
- **UIInteraction**: The protocol that an interaction implements to access the view that owns it.
